mapper.insert: INSERT INTO togetherList(tNum, categoryNum, userId, name, subject, regDate, hitCount, content, memberCnt, thumbnail ,town ) VALUES(#{tNum}, #{categoryNum}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{subject}, SYSDATE, 0, #{content}, #{memberCnt}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{town,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT categoryNum, categoryName FROM togetherCategory ORDER BY categoryNum

SELECT tNum, l.userId, m.nickName, subject, l.categoryNum, categoryName, content, hitCount, TO_CHAR(l.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, NVL(togetherLikeCount,0) togetherLikeCount FROM togetherList l JOIN member m ON l.userId = m.userId JOIN togetherCategory t ON l.categoryNum = t.categoryNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tNum, COUNT(*) togetherLikeCount FROM togetherLike GROUP BY tNum ) c ON l.tNum = c.tNum WHERE l.tNum = #{tNum}
